item.title: Broken footpath sign, 22nd April
item.description:
Broken public footpath sign between Bramble Chase and Willow Park Drive in Bishop's Cleeve. Broken sign put at base of post. Reported 22.4.25

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Willow Park Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 22nd April
item.description:
FW ABRUPT LEVEL DIFFERENCE STATS REQUIRED 1000 X 500 X 30mm ROAD CLOSURE MARKED AS NUMBER 4 PLUS 2 X NSD (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I use a wheelchair and fell out due to the very poor condition which has been reported several times already, 22nd April
item.description:
Footpath between Basset Close and Gretton Road. The council put signs up over 6 months ago but the path is now too dangerous use in my wheelchair having fallen out of it twice now. Can I also have details of the council legal department to claim for injuries suffered please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bassett Close, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tree outside our house has a lot of dead branches which we are concerned may fall and damage parked cars or pedestrians in windy weather., 22nd April
item.description:
The tree is located outside numbers 29 and 31, opposite the postbox. We have noticed the dead branches following the spring growth. I notice that the tree was reported in October but nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Eldon Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
